summary.Title: Electronics Technician or Prototyping Technician
summary.Presentation: Amfitech seeks an Electronics Technician or a Prototyping Technician to strengthen the prototyping team, and become the next member of the “Amfitech family”. The overall daily goal is to coop

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Amfitech seeks an Electronics Technician or a Prototyping Technician to strengthen the 
prototyping team, and become the next member of the “Amfitech family”. The overall daily goal is to cooperatively solving challenging development issues, and having fun doing it in a casual work environment.

 

About you:

We imagine that you are an educated Electronics Technician or a Prototyping Technician and you have 3-5 years of experience with electronics production and hardware support on a high professional level.
You are open and service minded. You appreciate making a good effort, and deliver high quality in hardware as well as in knowledge. You are a team player who values the good communication and thereby participates actively in strengthen the good mood and culture in Amfitech. 
You have a natural interest for technology and the job and the desire to independently achieve goals with the task set. You are confident in communication in English on a technical level.
You will be a part of the prototyping team, which is often the focal point of the company’s 
development projects. Here, prototypes are built and produced on many levels, and hardware support is provided to Amfitech’s software developers. 

 

Together with the prototyping team, your primary tasks will be:
• PCB assembly (SMD/HMD) using automatic and manual pick’n’place equipment
• Provide hardware support to the software team (replacement of components, 
troubleshooting and repairs at PCBA level)
• Prototype box build in many different levels
• Low volume productions
• Maintain and optimize production equipment
• Maintain components and equipment stock

 

About Amfitech: 

Amfitech is a privately held Danish product development company that has been in business for more than 20 years, with a strong focus in highly innovative technology development. We love big challenges. Cutting edge, never-before-seen projects on the limit of what’s possible is what motivates us. We are a strong partner when extra R&D capacity is needed, we have the capability to support the complete product development cycle from technology concepts to finished products running high volume production, and our customers range from large international companies who are world leading within innovation, to local entrepreneurs developing first generation prototypes.

We have continuous focus on employee well-being and are very aware of delivering support for all new members of the “Amfitech Family”. Helping each other on a daily basis is deeply founded in the company culture, and so is professional and personal development of each employee. 


Amfitech is characterized by the employees and management teams’ technology passion, which results in a vision to deliver tomorrows technology solutions. Development competencies include hardware, embedded software (firmware), PC/Linux application software, mechanics, prototyping – and more. Concept prototypes are being developed, utilizing their many technology platforms. Product maturation and production start-up are also part of everyday life. We have our own prototype workshop with SMD assembly machine and mechanical workshop.

The head office is placed in the dynamic and rapidly growing city of Vejle, Denmark, which is where the development team is situated, and from where new employees will work. The position is for 37 hours per week, and salary is according to your qualifications. 

 

Application and assessment:

Questions, application and resume can be addressed to HR- and communication responsible Helena Munk, phone: +45 28570002 or email: hm@amfitech.dk
The position is open, looking to be vacated as soon as possible, which is why interviews are being arranged as fast as possible.


For more information about us, please visit www.amfitech.dk and www.amfitrack.com
